response.original_title: SOME STRINGS: found image & sound, 1901–2024 “the cinema of solidarity”
response.overview: "The cinema of solidarity" is one of the propositions that compose the Some Strings program.  Some strings is rooted in that which stains the screens of history: in Palestine, where poet and teacher Refaat Alareer, like so many others beings, was targeted by Israeli strikes and killed along with seven other members of his family.
response.title: SOME STRINGS: found image & sound, 1901–2024 “the cinema of solidarity”
